bioconda.name: bioconductor-ffpe
bioconda.summary: Quality assessment and control for FFPE microarray expression data

biotools.summary: Identify low-quality data using metrics developed for expression data derived from Formalin-Fixed Paraffin-Embedded data. It contains a function for making Concordance At the Top plots (CAT-plots).

bioschemas.name: ffpe
bioschemas.summary: Identify low-quality data using metrics developed for expression data derived from Formalin-Fixed Paraffin-Embedded data. It contains a function for making Concordance At the Top plots (CAT-plots).
